name: Sector Plural Zed
description:
How to Play

WASD to move

LMB to shoot

RMB to aim

F to toggle flashlight

E to interact

To get up to date development updates on the overhaul we're working on now, check our blog over at http://vaguelydamp.tumblr.com/

Version Alpha 0.2

Changelog

  • Level generator now allows hallways to reconnect and form loops and more interesting structures
  • AI is now controlled by a central hivemind that reacts to player actions
  • AI now has pathfinding
  • Game Over screen tweaked to better show the level
  • Added version number on menu
  • Assorted bugfixes

Story

You have been sent to Sector Plural Zed, to repair the damage done on human installations by an apparentely alien rogue AI. Repair the installations systems and clear out the robotic scum to win. You can use the scrap found throughout the facility to repair the various systems.

How to Play

WASD to move

LMB to shoot

RMB to aim

F to toggle flashlight

E to interact

Notes

For the purposes of finishing within the timespan of the jam, there are 3 ship systems. The reactor, the medical bay, and the switch to disable the enemy spawner.

Also, don't forget to grab a gun, there should be one somewhere near where you spawn...

Thanks for checking out my game, doubly so for playing it :P
